version_description:
- Permanent night mode:
Night mode can now be activated permanently or just for the current session.

- Improved Localizations
- Some fixes and improvements

Note: Some settings can be reset by this update.

- App can now be started directly to Night Mode with 3D Touch
- Bugfixes
- Fixed a bug, which in some cases caused the time to be displayed incorrectly in 12h format.
